settings.text: Shoot us a note and weâ€™ll get back to you ASAP!

settings.question: Where does Pupsentials ship?
settings.answer: We ship across the U.S. and internationally! Every item is packaged and shipped from our studio in Austin, Texas.

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: Standard U.S. shipping is typically $6â€“$9, depending on the item. International shipping is calculated at checkout based on location and package weight.

settings.question: How long will it take my order to ship?
settings.answer: Because each item is custom-made, orders ship in 3â€“4 weeks. During holiday seasons or with multiple pets, timelines may extend to 5â€“6 weeks.

settings.question: Do you ship to PO boxes?
settings.answer: Yes! We can ship to PO boxes via USPS. If you prefer UPS, we recommend using a standard street address.

settings.question: How can I change my shipping address?
settings.answer: Email us at support@pupsentials.com within 24 hours of ordering. After that, we may not be able to adjust your address depending on order status.

settings.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.answer: You can cancel your order within 24 hours for a full refund. If your artwork has already been started, we offer a refund minus a $35 artwork fee. Unfortunately, once the embroidery process begins, changes canâ€™t be made.

settings.question: How can I check the status of my order?
settings.answer: Youâ€™ll receive an email with tracking as soon as your item ships. If itâ€™s been more than 4 weeks, email us for an update â€” weâ€™re happy to help.

settings.question: Why isnâ€™t my tracking updating?
settings.answer: Sometimes tracking can take 1â€“2 business days to reflect movement. If your package has been in the same location for 3+ days, reach out and weâ€™ll follow up directly with the carrier.

settings.question: How long does it take to receive my order?
settings.answer: Orders typically ship in 3â€“4 weeks. During peak seasons or if you have multiple pets, it may take 5â€“6 weeks.

settings.question: Where do you ship from?
settings.answer: Everything is checked, packaged, and shipped from our studio in Austin, TX.

settings.question: Who do you ship with?
settings.answer: We ship via UPS and USPS. Tracking is emailed to you once your order leaves our studio.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes! International orders may take 1â€“2 additional weeks depending on location and customs.

settings.question: What payment methods does Pupsentials accept?
settings.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay Installments. You can split your payment at checkout if desired.

settings.question: Can I cancel or get a refund?
settings.answer:
Yes â€” you can request a full refund within 24 hours of ordering by emailing us at
support@pupsentials.com.

If your artwork hasnâ€™t been started yet, weâ€™ll refund you in full.

If the artwork has already been created, youâ€™ll receive a refund minus a $35 hand-drawn artwork fee to honor our artistâ€™s time and care.

Because every item is made just for you, we do not accept returns or exchanges after 24 hours unless something arrives damaged or incorrect.

settings.question: Can I exchange my item?
settings.answer: We do not accept exchanges due to the personalized nature of our products. Please double-check your size and color before ordering â€” and reach out if youâ€™re unsure. We're happy to help you decide!

settings.question: What if my gift recipient wants to exchange or return their item?
settings.answer: We suggest giving them a Pupsentials gift card or letting them design their own item if unsure about size or style. Once embroidered, items cannot be exchanged or refunded unless damaged.

settings.question: What about limited-edition collections?
settings.answer: All limited-edition items follow our standard policies. Quantities are limited, and once sold out, we may not restock â€” so we recommend ordering early and double-checking all customization details.

settings.question: How do I wash my Pupsentials products?
settings.answer: Turn your item inside out, machine wash cold, and lay flat to dry. Do not iron directly on embroidery. Avoid bleach or high heat to preserve color and stitching.

settings.question: Where are your products made?
settings.answer: All artwork is created in-house by our team of artists. Embroidery is completed by our trusted production partners, then shipped to our studio in Austin, TX for final inspection and packaging.

settings.question: Can I put more than one dog or pet on my sweatshirt?
settings.answer: Yes! We allow up to 5 pets per item â€” each additional pet is $15. Want more than 5? Email us and weâ€™ll see if we can make it work!

settings.question: What is the size guide for your products?

All apparel is unisex with a slightly oversized, relaxed fit.

We currently offer Sâ€“2XL. A full size chart is available on each product page â€” or reach out to our team for live help picking the right fit.

settings.question: How do I place an order?
settings.answer: Choose your product (crewneck, hoodie, tote, etc.), select your color and size, upload your pet photo(s), and checkout. Our artists take it from there.

settings.answer: Yes â€” we save every artwork file. When reordering the same design, youâ€™ll receive 25% off automatically.

settings.question: Can I order more than one item with the same pet?

Yes â€” many customers order to honor pets theyâ€™ve lost. These are incredibly meaningful, and we treat them with extra care.

Clear, front-facing photos in natural light work best. Your petâ€™s full face and coloring should be

settings.answer: Yes â€” we love working on meaningful bulk orders. Whether itâ€™s for a wedding party, holiday gifting, or your companyâ€™s next event, we can make it special. Reach out here and weâ€™ll help you design the perfect group experience.

We currently offer Small through 2XL on all items. (Kids' sizing coming soon!)

settings.text: Our goal is for every customer to be totally satisfied with their purchase. If this isnâ€™t the case, let us know and weâ€™ll do our best to work with you to make it right.
We are unable to accept returns on certain items. These will be carefully marked before purchase.

settings.heading: When will I get my order?

settings.text: We will work quickly to ship your order as soon as possible. Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with further information. Delivery times vary depending on your location.
Our products are manufactured both locally and globally. We carefully select our manufacturing partners to ensure our products are high quality and a fair value.
Shipping is calculated based on your location and the items in your order. You will always know the shipping price before you purchase.
